install.packages("leaflet")
library(leaflet)


```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
```

```{r , echo=FALSE}
mymap<-leaflet()%>%
  addTiles()
mymap
```

```{r , echo=FALSE}
library(leaflet)
mymap<-mymap %>%
  addMarkers(lat=-38.2760763, lng=-57.8409073,popup="mdp")
mymap
```
